                            int clip,
                            boolean state)
Called by AbletonClipUpdater to update the state of Ableton clips.

Parameters:
track - Ableton track number (0 = track 1)
clip - Ableton clip number (0 = first clip)
state - State of the clip (1 = playing)

armed - The state of the track (1 = armed)

led

public void led(int x,
                int y,
                int value,
                int index)
Sends a /led x y value command to the monome if index is the selected page.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the led
y - The y coordinate of the led
value - The value of the led (1 = on, 0 = off)
index - The index of the page making the request

public void led_col(int col,
                    int value1,
                    int value2,
                    int index)
Sends a led_col message to the monome if index is the selected page.

Parameters:
col - The column to effect
value1 - The first 8 bits of the value
value2 - The second 8 bits of the value
index - The index of the page making the call

value1 - The first 8 bits of the value
value2 - The second 8 bits of the value
index - The index of the page making the call
